item.title: The Game Genie Generation
item.description: Today in Tedium:Â For kids of a certain age, the Game Genie was a life-changer. Literally. It could change the number of lives you had in whatever cartridge you put it on, as well as do a bunch of other crazy things to the game you were playing. It provided a thrill that we’ve kinda gotten away from as video games have grown more complex, but the device leaves behind a rich legacy.
